item.title: Nicole add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "I always order the banned books from a black market dealer in California, figuring if the State of Mississippi banned them, they must be good." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "Wasn't that the point of the book? For women to realize, We are just two people. Not that much separates us. Not nearly as much as I'd thought." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Kathryn Stockett
item.description: "You is kind. You is smart. You is important." -- Kathryn Stockett

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Colleen Hoover
item.description: "If you aren't on Goodreads, you should be. I've said it before, it's like Facebook for readers on crack." -- Colleen Hoover

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I fell in love with him. But I don't just stay with him by default as if there's no one else available to me. I stay with him because I choose to, every day that I wake up, every day that we fight or lie to each other or disappoint each other. I choose him over and over again, and he chooses me." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Jenny Joseph
item.description: "When I am an old woman I shall wear purple. With a red hat which doesn't go, and doesn't suit me." -- Jenny Joseph
